Stat 5, Spring 2023

Published Apr 03, 2023
Hsinbyume Pagoda, Mandalay, Burma.

This page is for students in my discussion sections & also for students taking the class generally. Warning: This course moves very quickly. Try NOT to fall behind, if you want to do well.
